title: GIM Tracker v1.0 Released!
description: Welcome to the official release of GIM Tracker. Track your ironman progress, set goals, and collaborate with your team.

title: RuneLite Integration Available
description: Connect RuneLite webhooks to automatically log valuable drops. Configure webhook URL: http://localhost:5000/webhook

title: How to Get Started
description: Create or join a team from the Team tab. Set personal and team goals in the Goals tab. Track your gear progression in the Gear tab.
